title: Keep Our Library Public!
short: We believe that all of the Blasco Erie County Public Library belongs to the public!

title: Fight Censorship in Alabama
short: Our state-wide grassroots group needs your help to fight back against anti-library extremism and censorship

title: Let Utah Read - Stop Censorship in Utah
short: We are a coalition dedicated to preserving Americans’ freedom to choose what we read. Please help support our anti-censorship work.

title: Right to Read ND support
short: RTRND is a nonpartisan group of North Dakotans who have come together in response to the growing movement to limit access to books.

title: Cape Club Organization Book Funding
short: CAPE is a student-led 501(c)(3) nonprofit that creates and donates inclusive children’s books redefining representation in literature.

title: Stock the new Dandridge Memorial Librarys shelves!
short: Help fill the shelves of our new building with brand new books and other collection materials!
